descriptionen: Monthly installment for individuals
Monthly installment for Family
Annual Limit
Private hospital charges

title: Room Charge Private Hospital
descriptionen: Private hospital charges

title: Operation
descriptionen: Operations

title: Specialist Services
descriptionen: Specialist services including X-Ray, Radiological and Nuclear Isotope Examination and Treatment, Ultrasound Examination Pathology, or laboratory examinations. (Routine medical checkups are not included)
Additional Benefits only for family Membership

title: Normal Birth
descriptionen: Birth Normal

title: Birth Cesarean
descriptionen: Cesarean Birth

title: Birth Utensil
descriptionen: Utensil Birth
Government Hospital Payments

title: Room Charge Government Hospital
descriptionen: Government Hospital nonpaying wards per day (Only for Maximum of 30 days per one event One day is interpreted as staying at one overnight)

title: Laboratory Test Government Hospital
descriptionen: Expenses incurred on Drugs purchased & Test Scan & X Rays undergone whilst being an inpatient in non-paying ward of a Government Hospital. (Subject to bills being produced)
Other Benefits

title: Birth Twins
descriptionen: Birth of twin within indoor limits

title: Cataract Surgery
descriptionen: Cost of Lens kit for Cataract Surgery(Maximum Limit)
Out Patient Benefits

title: Cost Of Drugs
descriptionen: Cost of drugs, (excluding Vitamins, Food Supplements, Warm Treatment and Routine Vaccination except Tetanus Toxoid Vaccination) (Vitamins can be reimbursed under the recommendation of UMO If the prescribed vitamins are essential to recover or control the medical condition of the patient.)

title: Investigation Fees
descriptionen: Cost of investigations under the recommendation of a medical officer registered in Sri Lanka Medical Council or Sri Lanka Ayurvedic Medical Council.

title: Consultation Fees
descriptionen: Consultation fees (Including e-channeling) only for Specialist or Medical Officers Registered in Sri Lanka Medical Council or Ayurvedic Doctors registered in Ayurvedic Medical Council.

title: Dental Cover
descriptionen: Filling & Exaction only

title: Cost Of Cervical Collar
descriptionen: Cost of Cervical Collar under the recommendation of an Orthopedic Surgeon (once in 2 years)

title: Cost Of Unani, Acupancher
descriptionen: Unani & Acupancher treatment under the recommendation of a Medical Officer registered under Medical Council of Unani & Acupancher.

title: Cost Of Lumber Corset
descriptionen: Cost of Lumber Corset under the recommendation of a Specialist Consultations (once in two years)

title: Covid Test
descriptionen: Additional benefit for the COVID-19 Test (PCR, Rapid Antigen Test etc) under the recommendation of MOH, MBBS qualified Doctor or PHI Open University with the certification signature of the UMO.
Personal Accident Cover Members only

title: Personal Accident
descriptionen: Personal Accident cover

title: Death Natural
descriptionen: Natural Death cover

title: Death
descriptionen: Death

title: Loss of all sight in both eyes
descriptionen: Total and permanent loss of all sight in both eyes

title: Loss of both hands or both feet or one hand & one foot
descriptionen: Total loss by physical severance of both hands or both feet or one hand or one foot

title: Loss of one hand or one foot together with all sight in one eye
descriptionen: Total loss by physical severance of one hand or one foot together with the total and permanent loss of all sight in one eye.

title: Loss of all sight in one eye
descriptionen: Total and permanent loss of all sight in one eye

title: Loss of one hand or one foot
descriptionen: Total loss by physical severance on one hand or one foot
Spectacle Cover Members Only

title: Spectacle Cover
descriptionen: Once in 2 years Members Only

title: Optometrical Testing, Consulting fees
descriptionen: Under the recommendation of an Eye Surgeon, Ophthalmologist- Once in 2 years Members Only
Critical Illness Cover Members Only

title: Any illness per year
descriptionen:
1.Myocardial Infarction
2.Coronary Artery Surgery
3.Stroke
4.Cardiac Pacemaker
5.Cancer(Radio & Chemotherapy treatment will be paid up to 50% from the CIC limit)
6.Renal Failure
7.Major organ transplant (The actual undergoing of transplantation as the recipient of a heart, lung, liver pancreas, small bowel, kidney, or bone marrow)
8.Paralysis
9.Multiple Sclerosis
10.Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension
11.Fulminant Viral Hepatitis
12.Heart Valve surgery
13.Surgery for a Disease of the Aorta
14.Chronic Liver disease
15.Major burns
16.Blindness
17.Deafness(Sickness-related)
18.Muscular Dystrophy
19.Loss of speech
20.Chronic lung disease
21.Apallic syndrome
22.Angioplasty Cover
23.Benign Brain Tumor
24.Coma
25.Motor Neuron Disease
26.Chronic Bone Disease
